item.description:
The Glastonbury Chamber of Commerce and Glastonbury Parks & Recreation are pleased to announce the musical line-up for the 2011 Glastonbury Riverfront Music Festival. The bands selected to play this summer are:

• July 6   Shaded Soul Band 
• July 13 Eight to the Bar
• July 20 Rob Zappulla (including Frank Sinatra tribute)
• July 27 Changes in Latitude (Jimmy Buffet tribute band)

These free concerts, scheduled for the 4 Wednesday nights in July, will be held on the lawn at Riverfront Park (behind the community center) from 7:00 to 9:00 p.m. Free parking & shuttle buses will be available from Glastonbury Boulevard.
item.name: Riverfront Music - Eight to the Bar
